Author: strippingforfun
Text: like i’m never really that hungry unless i’m stressed and weighing myself stresses me out so much (i’m sooo much heavier than my lw and i hate seeing the numbers) so then i binge throughout the day and then cry

Author: kenodhagxjah
Text: same!! I absolutely feel the exact same, every time i step on the scale i panic and everything goes to shit! So i'm not actually able to weigh myself. There is really no way around it, i tried taking measurements- which kinda helped but also measurements do not always correlate with weight - so in the end it comes down to just overstepping that anxiety
